title: Schneider Electric Demonstrates Industry-Leading Energy Management Solutions at NECA 2023 - PR Newswire
summary: Schneider Electric premiered Schneider Home, a first-of-its-kind home energy management solution, at the NECA 2023 Convention & Trade Show. The company also announced additional product innovations, including VisiPact Safety Switch, SourcePacT Isolation Switch, EcoStruxure Microgrid Flex, QO Smart Panel Solution, and EcoConsult Electrical Digital Twin Service.

green_product: TRUE, Schneider Home is a green product because it is designed to reduce the environmental impact of energy usage in homes.
green_process: FALSE, the article does not describe a green process.

title: Schneider Electric Unveils Latest Texas Manufacturing Plant as Part of a $300 Million Investment in U.S. Manufacturing - PR Newswire
summary: Schneider Electric has invested $300 million in U.S manufacturing, including a new 160,000 square foot manufacturing plant in El Paso, TX that will create approximately 400 new jobs. The plant will produce custom designed low voltage and medium voltage electrical products that safely distribute electrical power from the utility grid to various places within industrial, commercial, and residential settings. The first set of products manufactured in the new El Paso plant shipped out earlier this summer to customers in the data center sector.
green_innovation: TRUE - The plant will produce electrical products that safely distribute electrical power, contributing to the advancement of the energy transition and the build out of America's infrastructure.
business_innovation: TRUE - The new plant is part of a $300 million U.S. manufacturing investment the company has made to support customers who will use the electrical equipment produced in it.
green_product: FALSE - The article does not describe any specific green products.

title: Schneider Electric Opens Pre-Orders for Schneider Home, A First-of-its-Kind Home Energy Management Solution - PR Newswire
summary: Schneider Electric announces Schneider Home, an integrated home energy management solution, and EcoStruxure Microgrid Flex and EcoXpert Microgrid Badge certification program. These offerings support the acceleration of a new energy landscape for industrial, commercial, and residential prosumers, empowering them with more visibility and decision-making over their energy consumption.

title: Anker SOLIX Showcases Next-Generation Home Energy Solutions at RE+ 2023 - PR Newswire
summary: Anker, a global leader in charging, power delivery, and power storage, has announced its participation in RE+, introducing two innovative products - the Anker SOLIX X1 Home Energy Solution and the Anker SOLIX F3800 Portable Power Station - to industry professionals in the United States. The Anker SOLIX X1 Home Energy Solution is a super powerful home battery backup system featuring an ultra-slim modular design that will seamlessly blend into any home d√©cor. It is customizable with up to six battery packs per system (30 kWh). The Anker SOLIX F3800 Portable Power Station is the first power station to feature AC coupling and support home solar power cycling when paired with the Anker SOLIX Home Power Panel.
